row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) > 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 8)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
row_desc: Queen has at least one mini challenge win.
col_desc: Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has two lip sync wins.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
